name: Collar of Constriction
data: It decreases the users strength unnoticably.
It decreases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It decreases the users wisdom unnoticably.
It decreases the users intelligence unnoticably.
It decreases the users charisma unnoticably.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users asphyxiation resistance strongly.
